name: @services/lesson-notice-service
description: EventBridge-triggered Lambda: finds latest package per user, sends lesson notice via SQS (skip if notice sent in last 7 days)

scripts.package: npm run build && esbuild src/handler/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js && (cd dist && zip -q -r ../function.zip index.js)
